Title: Incoming SDE
Description: Working on feature work for the Kindle Scribe

Title: SDE Intern
Description: Built a full-stack end-to-end dashboard for the Kindle Electronic Ink devices to help developers and QAs develop and verify features behind A/B testing.
Developed the front-end in React Native/JavaScript and back-end API in C++ and Java, resolving 20+ Jira  tickets
Reduced the time it takes to override 200+ experiments A/B experiments from 3.5 hours to 1 second, a 99.99% improvement, saving developers and QAs many  hours to develop and debug features.
Created and executed a test plan with over 40+ tests and merged the project to production
Created shell unix scripts to automate testing the API for QAs.

Title: SWE Co-op
Description: Worked on an agile team to triage, test, and resolve issues regarding the FactoryTalk Optix product.
Wrote over 50 functional and automated tests in Python and C# using the Selenium and Squish testing frameworks for the FactoryTalk Optix release.

Enhanced the testing framework by applying Object Oriented design to areas of test automation, adding a layer of test abstraction to make the testing framework more resilient to future change in the product.
Resolved over 25+ Jira tickets regarding the testing framework and python tests.
